channel.title: Need help Server running but how do i make myslef admin?
channel.description: hey i just made my server and it works !! ;D but how do i make my self admin ??

item.title: Need help Server running but how do i make myslef admin?
item.dc:creator: @kevin5475845 kevin5475845
item.description:
@kevin5475845 wrote:

if you want to switch it on or off just look at this topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,146696.0.html

otherwise if you always want it on search after this i nclient.java

public boolean process

then under it add this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR_NAME")){ if(IsDead) IsDead = false; NewHP = playerLevel[3]; }

replace YOUR_NAME with your name between the “”

Read full topic
item.source: Need help Server running but how do i make myslef admin?

item.title: Need help Server running but how do i make myslef admin?

item.description:
@0wnz_u1 wrote:

im new to this so sorry if i sound stupid wheres character file under?
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 02:39:46 PM[/size][hr]o i found character file but its blank??[br][size=1]Posted on: May 31, 2007, 02:40:41 PM[/size][hr]o i got it thanks do you no how to get infinate hp?
